title: Open concept living & dining, Patio w/ BONUS storage, Bellevue 1BR apt
posting_body: Our Bellevue apartments and town homes – adjacent to Goldsmith Park and directly across the street from the Microsoft campus – are surrounded by lush landscaping and soaring trees, feeling as if you are in the secluded country.
But with businesses, great shopping and dining close by in downtown Redmond and at Redmond Town Center, you never feel far from anything.
Each apartment home provides spacious floor plans, modern kitchens, designer touches, and plenty of storage.
Enjoy fabulous amenities as well, including outdoor pools, fitness centers and business lounge.
Newly installed windows, doors, roof, and siding.
Contact us today to schedule a tour!
Office Hours -- Monday - Saturday 9:00 am - 6:00 pm
Photos in ad may not be of actual apartment, however we try our best to use photos similar to the floor plan.
